title: Walking Lesson!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Alright, shall we take a break?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah, that’s a good idea. But really, walking lessons are pretty tiring when you actually do them huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, it is, right? Even though you’re only walking, it’s a great exercise<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It won’t be noisy to do at night, and it’s perfect to do alone. Hey hey, did I do well?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Of course. You’re really good. You learn so quickly that I don’t think that there will be anything left for me to teach soon<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ehehe, when you put it like that, I feel even more motivated~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>But, there’s one thing…. Nozomi-chan, can you turn around?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>? Like this….? Hngh!? Hyaaah! W- w- w-, what? What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>What do you mean what, I’m running down your spine….like…. this. Even when you’re sitting down, you always have to consciously imagine that you’re being suspended from above, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>G-, geez! You could’ve just told me that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, that reaction coming from you is so fresh, Nozomi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
